### Examples of online exercises:

These are keyed to the chapters of the *Data Computing* book. This summer, all the exercises in the book will be translated to this interactive format. Facilities for logging student answers (for grading purposes) will be added to the documents.

Chapters [one](https://dtkaplan.shinyapps.io/Chapter-01-collection/), [two](https://dtkaplan.shinyapps.io/chapter-02-collection5/), [three](https://dtkaplan.shinyapps.io/Chapter-03-collection/), [four](https://dtkaplan.shinyapps.io/Chapter-04-collection/), [five](https://dtkaplan.shinyapps.io/Chapter-05-collection/), [six](https://dtkaplan.shinyapps.io/Chapter-06-collection/), [seven](https://dtkaplan.shinyapps.io/Chapter-07-collection/), [eight](https://dtkaplan.shinyapps.io/Chapter-08-collection/), [nine](https://dtkaplan.shinyapps.io/Chapter-09-collection/)
